metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24504 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Uncontrolled resource consumption in some Intel(R) Ethernet E810 Adapter drivers for Linux before version 1.0.4 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

notes.Note: sbeattie> these are intel out-of-tree drivers. according to suse bug, the in-tree drivers are fixed via b126bd6bcd6710aa984104e979a5c930f44561b4 possibly introduced in 334cb0626de1 ("ice: Implement VSI replay framework")

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
linux-meta package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
